title: Vex 7

controls: Mastering the controls is the key to surviving in Vex 7. Here’s how it works:

Left and Right Arrow Keys (or A and D): Move your character left or right.Up Arrow Key (or W): Jump to dodge traps, climb ledges, and reach higher places.Down Arrow Key (or S): Crouch to avoid low-hanging threats and sometimes slide or dive through narrow openings.Spacebar: Use it for special actions like breaking bricks.
content.howToPlay:
Vex 7 continues the classic run-and-jump style of the series but throws in new surprises. Here is how to play Vex 7.

Once you begin, your character will spawn in a safe spot. You’ll see different paths and platforms to explore.Move carefully to avoid traps like spikes, spinning blades, and dangerous drop-offs. Look for safe ledges or hidden paths that might help you progress.Coins are often placed in tricky spots, so be ready for a challenge!Each act has a portal. Once you find the portal, jump through to move on to the level hub and enter the next act from there.Vex is hard but fair. Each level has checkpoint flags, so if you fail, you’ll return to the latest flag instead of starting over.Vex 7 has 9+1 acts with increasing difficulty. However, learning the pattern and timing of each trap will increase your chances of staying alive.
content.tips: Vex 7 might feel tough at first. But each level teaches you new tricks. Don’t worry if you fail. Just learn from your errors and keep going.After consecutive deaths, the game will ask you "Are you OK?". Press "No," and that'll put you into an invincibility bubble for a while.Pay attention to the way and timing of obstacles' movement. Some spikes pop up at regular intervals, while others trigger after you step on certain spots. Purple blocks drop after you stand on them.Always aim for the next checkpoint before attempting any risky moves. This way, you won’t lose all your progress if you fail.A perfectly timed jump can make a big difference. Try tapping the W just before you reach a ledge for a smooth vault over spikes.
content.developer: Vex 7 is crafted by Amazing Adam (the mind behind the entire Vex series). With each new version, improvements and new challenges pop up, so there’s always a reason to come back. If you'd like to revisit prequels, you can play Vex 3 for free on OnlineGames.io
